official_title: To repeal the provision of law that provides for automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to eliminate automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.

titles.title: To repeal the provision of law that provides for automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.
